title: Le Pain Quotidien - Charron
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several vegetarian dishes as well a few vegan ones (denote by carrot sign). This branch is located in the courtyard of a Haussman style building.
